questions.question: In Application builder, a list based on predefined pairs of display values and return values is known as?
Which of the following actions can be carried out in Application Builder using a button page item?
In Application Builder, you can reference item values stored in session state in regions, computations, processes, validation, and branches. True or False?
In Application builder, a list based on a SQL query you write that selects values from a table is known as?
A list of values (LOV) is a static or dynamic set of values used to display a specific type of page item. True or False?
In Application Builder, you can use buttons to direct users to a specific page or URL, or to post or process information. True or False?
A computation is a logic that assigns values to a single item. True or False?
Which of the following are types of Validations in Application Builder?
In Application Builder, a branch can be defined to go to which of the following?
Match the descriptions to the two processes Application Express engine relies on when you run an application.
options: Show Page : is the page rendering process.
Accept Page : is the page rendering process.
correct_answers: Show Page : is the page rendering process.

questions.question: The process to retrieve records from a single database table or view in Application Builder is defined as which of the following?
A validation is used in an application form page to ensure integrity of the data entered by users. True or False?
A page process is a series of event that run when a page is loaded or submitted. True or False?
Validations specific to a single item in Application Builder are defined as which of the following?
When you request a page using a URL, the Application Express engine is running which of the following?
Forms are made up of fields, called items. True or False?
Once a form is created, you cannot re-arrange form fields. True or False?
A master detail form reflects a one-to-many relationship between two tables. True or False?
Forms can enable users to update multiple rows in a table. True or False?
Which of the following statements best describes an Editable Interactive Grid Application Builder form type?
options: Presents users a set of data in a searchable, customizable report.
Creates a form and list view that enables users to update a single row in a database table.
Creates two pages. One page displays a report.
Builds a form based on stored procedure arguments.
questions.correct_answer: Presents users a set of data in a searchable, customizable report.

questions.question: Application Builder allows which of the following data sources when creating a form?
Forms are application components that are used for data input from end users. True or False?
Forms are made up of types. True or False?
Which of the following Access Control would be set to enable all users access to an application?
Authentication defines who you are whilst Authorization defines What are you allowed to do after logging in. True or False?
Shared components can only be added to one page within your application. True or False?
Which of the following statements best describe Lists as a Shared Component?
options: A shared collection of links. You control the appearance through templates. Each element has a display condition that enables you to control when it displays.
Offer users a simple navigation path for moving between pages in an application. Entries can display as a link from an image or text.
A list of links that enables users to navigate the pages in an application. Only supported in applications using the Universal Theme - 42.
An effective way to navigate users between pages in an application. You can create two types : standard or parent.
Provide users with hierarchical navigation. A hierarchical list of links that display using templates. Can be displayed as a list of links or as a path.

questions.question: Which of the following statements best describe Lists as a Shared Component?
options: A shared collection of links. You control the appearance through templates. Each element has a display condition that enables you to control when it displays.
Offer users a simple navigation path for moving between pages in an application. Entries can display as a link from an image or text.
A list of links that enables users to navigate the pages in an application. Only supported in applications using the Universal Theme - 42.
An effective way to navigate users between pages in an application. You can create two types : standard or parent.
Provide users with hierarchical navigation. A hierarchical list of links that display using templates. Can be displayed as a list of links or as a path.
questions.correct_answer: A shared collection of links. You control the appearance through templates. Each element has a display condition that enables you to control when it displays.

questions.question: In Application Builder you can create which types of Lists?
Shared components are common elements that can display or be applied on any page within an application. True or False?
Which of the following are examples of Navigation Aids in Shared Components?
Which of the following themes can a Workspace administrator create?
Developers can use template options to complete all of the following except:
Application Builder supports all of the following types of charts except:
The Theme Roller offers the workspace administrator the ability to?
options: Save customizations as a Theme Style.
Use customizations designed by other administrators from a gallery.
Share customizations with other administrators through a gallery.
Customize the look and feel of applications.
Modify attributes and see changes applied to your in real time.
correct_answers: Save customizations as a Theme Style.
Customize the look and feel of applications.
Modify attributes and see changes applied to your in real time.

questions.question: An application written in Application Express is stored as meta-data in the Oracle Database. True or False?
You cannot migrate an APEX application from your environment to the following?
Which of the following are steps required when migrating an application between environments?
A plug-in is one of the built-in types of Application Express. True or False?
Which of the following steps are required to be defined when creating a Dynamic Action?
options: When the action happens (with optional conditions).
What action or actions are performed.
What elements are affected by the action.

questions.question: Developers can export and import plug-ins to other workspaces. True or False?
The use of a Dynamic Action will increase your overall page size. True or False?
You can create a dynamic action in which of the following ways?
options: Under Rendering, locate the item, right-click and select Create Dynamic Action.
Under Dynamic Actions, right-click Events and select Create Dynamic Action.

questions.question: A plug-in is an extension to the built-in types of Application Express. True or False?
To use Dynamic actions to define complex client-side behavior declaratively you need to know or code JavaScript or AJAX. True or False?
Which of the following chart types is a flexible Flash and JavaScript (HTML5) based solution?
A tree is a hierarchical navigation mechanism. True or False?
Which of the following calendar types Calendar is based on the FullCalendar jQuery library?
In APEX you add a chart region to your page using Page Designer. True or False?
Which of the following statements best describes how Trees are implemented?
options: Using multiple queries that identify the rows to be used as the start of your query, and the relationships between parent rows and child rows of the hierarchy.
Using a single hierarchical query that identifies the row to be used as the start of your query, and the relationship between parent rows and child rows of the hierarchy.
A query to identify all the branches to include in your tree.
A query that identifies the rows and relationships between child rows only.
questions.correct_answer: Using a single hierarchical query that identifies the row to be used as the start of your query, and the relationship between parent rows and child rows of the hierarchy.

questions.question: In APEX, when a tree is created, how are nodes typically displayed?
